org.sakaiproject.tool.cover

Class ActiveToolManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.tool.cover.ActiveToolManager
  • Deprecated. 
    Static covers should not be used in favour of injection or lookup via the component manager. This cover will be removed in a later version of the Kernel

    public class ActiveToolManager
extends Object

    ActiveToolManager is a static Cover for the ActiveToolManager; see that interface for usage details.
